game.name: Forbidden Solitaire
game.shortDescription: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.
game.developers: Grey Alien Games, Night Signal Entertainment
game.publishers: Night Signal Entertainment, Grey Alien Games
